title: Mailvox: even teachers agree
author: VD
content_html:
TG laces his prose with contempt:


I was a certified high school teacher of French. I lasted one year. Couldn’t stand the water-tightless logic of innumerable mad hatters applying the teachings of John Dewey and school-of-education propaganda. I am now a university adjunct teaching composition I courses. I have to teach things to my students that they should have learned in 7th grade. The only solution is to disenfranchise all schools of education. In reality, teacher certification laws have one main purpose: full employment for education professors who otherwise are well suited to be door greeters at Wal Mart.

Indeed.
